price: 22. Telle sera votre récompense, et tels seront reconnus vos efforts.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَكَانَ سَعۡيُكُم مَّشۡكُورًا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā kāna lakum jazāan wakāna saʿyukum mashkūran
